title: Learn Web development
description: This course is designed to let you learn all the skills you need to be a perfect web developer

lessons.title: Learn HTML
lessons.content: In this section you will learn the fundamental of web development and how to design a very simple website using html as the markup language

lessons.title: Learn CSS
lessons.content: In this section you will use the styling blocks to style your pages you build in the previous section

lessons.title: Learn JavaScript
lessons.content: In this section we will dive into the interactivty of web pages and how to make your webpages respond to user actions

lessons.title: Interactive web templates
lessons.content: This section is all about practing what we just leanrt in HTML & CSS & JavaScript lessons we will do so by building interactive & responsive website designs
